overview:
Neil Gronowetter is founder and CEO of 9ExtraFloors, a location-based mobile dating app. He is also founder and CEO of Imperium Realty, a boutique commerical real estate brokerage. Imperium Realty specializes in the sale of off-market office buildings, apartment buildings and development sites in New York, and major coastal cities.

9ExtraFloors merges the immediacy of the Internet Age, with the real estate investor’s call for “Location, location, location.” It provides a free, no-strings-attached opportunity for users to meet discreetly, one-on-one.
